title: The Delicate Art of Death
description: Stacy Martinez must uncover a small town's dark secret if ghosts from her past don't get her firstâ€¦After the events of "Tears of the Dragon" and "The Osiris Initiative", Stacy Martinez returns in her own solo adventure.Ex-FBI agent Stacy Martinez rolls into Jackson, Kansas, to visit her family with a duffel bag full of stolen money and a dangerous past full of secrets. But this small town has a dark secret of its own. Young women are mysteriously dying. Stacy suspects foul play, but can she trust her judgment when no one else does?Just when she's making headway, her past unexpectedly catches up with her, throwing herself and everyone she loves into danger. With killers closing in, can she solve the mystery before it's too late?
author: Ryan McGinnis
